column4: hey guys, i just reformatted one of my computers, stuck ubuntu on and i can't get the X-Display to start, i don't think it's recognizing my graphics driver....i grabbed the ati drivers and tried to run them, they seemed to install, no luck on reboot, how do i configure X via command line to use the drivers I installed? Please help! =)
i ran the command, rebooted and it booted fine, now i've got to reconfigure for my secondary monitor...
